name: Finnish Shipowners' Association
membership:
European Community Shipowners Association ECSA
www.ecsa.eu
goal: A trade association with an interest in industrial and labour market policies. Its members include 24 Finnish shipping companies and 115 ships under the finnish flag.
interests: Climate Action, Employment and Social Affairs, Environment, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives: Shipping policy, Environmental protection, Climate action, Foreign Trade and Taxation
